name: Chemdawg Sour Diesel
description: Chemdawg Sour Diesel (or Chem Sour) from Reservoir Seeds is a sativa-dominant hybrid cannabis strain that combines champion genetics from Chemdawg D and Sour Diesel. With a sharp sour bite, Chemdawg Sour Diesel has a funky fuel and earthy pine aroma that stuns the senses. Its buzzing euphoria leaves you feeling elevated and uplifted, but anxiety-prone individuals should tread carefully with this high-flying sativa.
attributes_title: Happy, Energetic, Giggly, Creative, Sleepy, Fatigue, Stress, Pain, Lack of Appetite, Depression, Dizzy, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Paranoid, Anxious
